languages.text: {n}Еще один стих. Еще один шаг по тропе кровавых следов. Загаданная вам загадка {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}тривиальна{/d} — "час верный" настал, и Висирь ждет, что вы свершите вынесенный им годы назад приговор.{/n}

{n}Another verse, another step along the trail of blood. The riddle is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: it is time for death to take what it is due, and the Vizsier is waiting expectantly for you to carry out the sentence he passed years ago.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Еще один стих. Еще один шаг по тропе кровавых следов. Загаданная вам загадка {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}тривиальна{/d} — "час верный" настал, и Висирь ждет, что вы свершите вынесенный им годы назад приговор.{/n}

{n}Another verse, another step along the trail of blood. The riddle is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: it is time for death to take what it is due, and the Vizsier is waiting expectantly for you to carry out the sentence he passed years ago.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ein weiterer Vers und ein weiterer Schritt auf dem blutigen Pfad. Das Rätsel ist {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: Es wird Zeit, dass der Tod die Ernte einfährt und der Vizsier wartet gespannt, ob du das vor Jahren gefällte Urteil vollstreckst.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another verse, another step along the trail of blood. The riddle is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: it is time for death to take what it is due, and the Vizsier is waiting expectantly for you to carry out the sentence he passed years ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ein weiterer Vers und ein weiterer Schritt auf dem blutigen Pfad. Das Rätsel ist {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: Es wird Zeit, dass der Tod die Ernte einfährt und der Vizsier wartet gespannt, ob du das vor Jahren gefällte Urteil vollstreckst.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Un autre verset marquant un pas de plus sur la piste sanglante. L'énigme est {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}triviale{/d} : il est temps pour la mort d'obtenir son dû, et le vizir attend avec impatience que vous exécutiez sa sentence prononcée des années plus tôt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another verse, another step along the trail of blood. The riddle is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: it is time for death to take what it is due, and the Vizsier is waiting expectantly for you to carry out the sentence he passed years ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Un autre verset marquant un pas de plus sur la piste sanglante. L'énigme est {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}triviale{/d} : il est temps pour la mort d'obtenir son dû, et le vizir attend avec impatience que vous exécutiez sa sentence prononcée des années plus tôt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Otro verso, otro paso por un camino de sangre. El acertijo es {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: es hora de que la muerte se cobre su precio, y el Visir espera que ejecutes la sentencia que él dictó hace años.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another verse, another step along the trail of blood. The riddle is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: it is time for death to take what it is due, and the Vizsier is waiting expectantly for you to carry out the sentence he passed years ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Otro verso, otro paso por un camino de sangre. El acertijo es {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: es hora de que la muerte se cobre su precio, y el Visir espera que ejecutes la sentencia que él dictó hace años.{/n}

languages.text: {n}次の詩、血の軌跡を辿る次の一歩。謎は{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}些細{/d}なものばかりだ。今こそは、死が時が来たものを奪う時であり、ヴィジールは何年も前に下した宣告を実行するべく、期待とともにあなたを待っている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another verse, another step along the trail of blood. The riddle is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: it is time for death to take what it is due, and the Vizsier is waiting expectantly for you to carry out the sentence he passed years ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}次の詩、血の軌跡を辿る次の一歩。謎は{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}些細{/d}なものばかりだ。今こそは、死が時が来たものを奪う時であり、ヴィジールは何年も前に下した宣告を実行するべく、期待とともにあなたを待っている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}又是新的诗句，又是在鲜血的道路上新的一步。这个谜语实在是{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}太简单了{/d}。死亡接受贡品的时刻到了，而宿老正期待你来亲手执行他多年前便裁定下来的判决。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another verse, another step along the trail of blood. The riddle is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: it is time for death to take what it is due, and the Vizsier is waiting expectantly for you to carry out the sentence he passed years ago.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}又是新的诗句，又是在鲜血的道路上新的一步。这个谜语实在是{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}太简单了{/d}。死亡接受贡品的时刻到了，而宿老正期待你来亲手执行他多年前便裁定下来的判决。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yine mısralar. Kan izinin üstünde bir adım daha. Bunun özü {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}basit{/d}: Ölümün, alacağını tahsil etme vakti gelmiş. Vezir ise yıllar evvel verdiği emri yerine getirmeni sabırsızlıkla bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Another verse, another step along the trail of blood. The riddle is {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_MOT_Mind}trivial{/d}: it is time for death to take what it is due, and the Vizsier is waiting expectantly for you to carry out the sentence he passed years ago.{/n}
